hints.content:
Anna caught $\goldE{27}$ fish before lunch.

![A number line starts at 27 and extends to the right.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/5ccd3baf18041074f86374dad6f5b4881dc62305)

To add on the number line, we jump to the **right**.

Then Anna caught $\maroonD{19}$ more fish after lunch.

![A number line starts at 27 with plus 19 and goes to 46.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/e7ca01f1180c5314354db46c67ebc42e32d1a8d2)

$\goldE{27} + \maroonD{19} = 46$

After dinner, Anna caught $\blueE{28}$ fish.

![A number line starts at 27 with plus 19 and goes to 46. From 46 plus 28 goes to 74.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/9d9e56b90c7ac0b6f933e6bdaa9544e46bb95713)

$46+  \blueE{28} = 74$

This number line represents how to find the total number of fish that Anna caught:

![A number line starts at 27 with plus 19 and goes to 46. From 46 plus 28 goes to  ?.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/1bf1032ab550b766e3e42e36b6797e944714e3c1)

Anna caught $74$ fish.

question.content:
Before lunch time, Anna caught $27$ fish.  

Anna caught $19$ more fish after lunch and $28$ more fish after dinner.  

**Which number line shows how to find how many total fish Anna caught by the end of the day?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

**How many total fish had Anna caught by the end of the day?**  

[[☃ numeric-input 1]] fish

choices.content: ![A number line starts at 27 with plus 27 and goes to 54. From 54 plus 19  goes to 73. From 73 plus 28  goes to ?.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/6976812c0bb2a258323b7a6ad71db2d91f31a70b)
![A number line starts at 27 with plus 19 and goes to 46. From 46 plus 28 goes to  ?.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/1bf1032ab550b766e3e42e36b6797e944714e3c1)
